review.title: “One of the best executive search firms in the U.S.”
review.pros: Pros – Pros include but are not limited to:1. Outstanding team of strategic, business-minded, dedicated recruiters/account executives with deep industry and search expertise, passion for the business, and genuine caring for clients and their needs2. Strong moral and ethical values - unrelenting commitment to the highest business standards, integrity, professionalism, and complete client satisfaction (98% repeat & referred client business sustained for over 10 years)3. Servant leadership - we put others first and continually seek ways to help clients, candidates and team members grow and succeed to their fullest potential. Interacting as partners and peers, we share knowledge, ideas and constructive input as we collectively strive to meet/exceed client and candidate expectations on a daily basis and build/nurture new business relationships4. Long-standing "trusted partner" relationships and impressive track records with top-tier clients and top-ranked executive candidates5. Superior reputation in the industry, known for placing key executives in strategic, mission-critical impact roles at the intersection of business and technology, yielding exemplary business transformation, growth and financial outcomes for clients, and life-changing career growth and advancement opportunities for candidates6. Excellent performance-based compensation programs that reward great results and promote individual and team success. Create your own path and enjoy many career growth opportunities7. Well-established infrastructure, with access to necessary resources and ongoing training8. Collaborative, supportive and vitalized work environment built on trust, respect, hard work and doing what is right...full-time staff tenures are 12-15 years (to-date)9. Comfortable, friendly, productive office setting with easy access to airports, business services, retail, prime residential areas, restaurants, etc.10. Continued growth in prominent industries including: Healthcare, Technology/IT, Consulting, Outsourcing, Financial Services, Insurance, Oil & Gas, Utilities, Telecom, Retail, Manufacturing and others.
review.cons: Cons – As a boutique retained search firm and one of the best in the industry, we are often invited to compete against large and well-known global firms. Widespread name recognition for a boutique firm can be challenging from a new business development perspective; however, our 100% referenceable and renowned customer base, previous successes, refined methodologies, team approach, unique fee structure and proven ability to deliver significant return on clients' search investments generally unseats any hesitancy due to lack of familiarity. RGBA's track record is second to none.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
